templates.title: AutoIndex
templates.note: Lightweight go web server that provides a searchable directory index. Optimized for handling large numbers of files (100k+) and remote file systems (with high latency) through a continously updated directory cache.
templates.name: autoindex

templates.title: AWTRIX2
templates.note: (AWsome maTRIX) is a full color dot matrix that displays applications from simple time display to Fortnite account statistics.
templates.name: awtrix2

templates.title: Motivation
templates.note: A web page with your age.

templates.title: Samba
templates.note: Since 1992, Samba has provided secure, stable and fast file and print services for all clients using the SMB/CIFS protocol, such as all versions of DOS and Windows, OS/2, Linux and many others.
templates.name: samba

templates.title: Yarr
templates.note: 开源 RSS 阅读器，Go 实现，数据存储于 SQLite。
templates.name: yarr
